Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Surprise”
Reviews.Author: Sarah B
Reviews.Content: paid £65 including breakfast london thats amazing youre paying £65 cant expect pleasantly surprised recently refurbished nice photos website havent updated dont justice bathroom tiny im person found squeeze shower free wifi parking literally park outside free perfect russell square 5 min walk breakfast pretty id hotel value money youre expecting id stay business trip

Reviews.Title: “Mabledon Court ..small but sweet”
Reviews.Author: Frillylil
Reviews.Content: lovely little hotel quick london clean comfortable trifle chap reception delightfully helpful staff encountered perfectly situated kings cross euston convenient popping bloomsbury provided acceptable cooked breakfast price recommend heartily

Reviews.Title: “Adequate for one night”
Reviews.Author: alldon
Reviews.Content: stayed close euston reasonable rate chain miniscule single double bed adequate lovely oldfashioned quirky lift bed comfortable clean little space shower bijou hot strong wet warm windows carry war plugs wasnt rate included breakfast huge freshly cooked lounge beside breakfast reception 24 hours friendly pub selling food door usual chain restaurants euston road individual restaurants short walk bloomsbury

Reviews.Content: understand property prices central london rental prices match owners money square footage hotel knowing economic necessity surprised clean comfortable ensuite looked recently refurbished flat screen tv tea coffee facilities intending stay short holiday staff friendly helpful hotel quiet breakfast engish plus buffet cereal fruit eat standard food surprisingly excellent english cooked seperately real bonus hotel easy walking distance main line stations underground stations travel expensive central london huge saving enables cinema walking distance brunswick centre neighbourhood london christmas day enjoyed amazing lunch nearby greek restaurant thank

Reviews.Title: “Great budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: Angie R
Reviews.Content: stayed whilst overnighting train euston wales location euston station 500m kings cross station clean comfortable bed breakfast included didnt left started 730am bathroom tiny fit shower cubicle motorhome reception helpful free wifi walking road near kings cross dinner location excellent pub door nice bargin budget hotel

Reviews.Title: “Well-located budget hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Lauriecumb
Reviews.Content: hotel location near rail stations bus routes central london bed comfortable little noise night breakfast bright basement fine decent pub door rates reasonable london standards friendly helpful staff happily return

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Experience!”
Reviews.Author: greasergal
Reviews.Content: read bad reviews husband decided try anyway mistake tiny bathroom disgusting shower exaggeration 2 feet 2 feet air conditioning top key leave return fancy hotel 1920s icing cake told night cancel rest stay reservation expedia 48 hours notice stayed 2 nights check tell didnt cancel expedia charged 65 pounds purposely didnt tell 2 days cancelled told thieves stay else

Reviews.Title: “Not sure!!!”
Reviews.Author: Nicole_Allison
Reviews.Content: booked hotel five minute walk st pancras international train station leaving paris day highlight hotel budget hotel costing 65 pounds night london expecting bathroom bed uncomfortable squeezed 2 walls meant person climb bed uncomfortable stay night overall deal quick stopover day woke rashes legs lasted week worried catching book hotel plus close station

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable but unbelievably shabby and small, with hole in carpet and windowsill dropping in bits.”
Reviews.Author: YorkshireRosie
Reviews.Content: hotel quiet comfortable handy st pancras kings cross stations breakfast pub door value meals rest negative deluxe double measured 9 9 46 bed pushed corner standard double 4 bed bathroom unbelieveable grate middle floor filth round shower size 10 fit shower curtain sticking hole carpet photo windowsill seen believed photo resembled squat night

Reviews.Title: “Hotel from Hell”

Reviews.Content: booked deluxe wildest imagination meet description dirty smelly desparately decorating found staff warned stay sooner sleep park bench night

Reviews.Title: “Great location, wonderful staff and good breakfast.”
Reviews.Author: ANNEANDBOB
Reviews.Content: hotel location 5 mins walk russel square tube lovely pub door hotel reasonably priced meals hotel warned size shower am 5 foot fit breakfast lovely little variation ben nice owners try adding mushrooms fried bread hash browns nice friendly staff recommend happy stay

Reviews.Title: “Great position, pity about the room”
Reviews.Author: JillFrance
Reviews.Content: plus position using euston kings cross st pancras friendly helpful staff breakfast delightful diningroom minus creeky floorboards lack soundproofing awful drain smell showerroom showerroom door fit closed poor wifi connection

Reviews.Title: “Great location, poor night's sleep”
Reviews.Author: Soomka
Reviews.Content: pros brilliant location five minutes walk kings cross convenient staff extremely friendly eager help cons pillows im normally complain sort bed flat heavy plain uncomfortable found decent pillow cupboard idea presumably underfloor check radiator heating hard nights sleep ideal youre looking crash thats close kings cross wouldnt stay couple nights

Reviews.Title: “Served a purpose”
Reviews.Author: paulaNorfolk
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 days whilst look london hotel served purpose close kings cross station provided breakfast including yogurt fruit toast cereal english fry tea coffee juice tired ours clean bedding fresh clean towels clean soft changed day â£150 paid easter weekend probably found wouldnt stay 2 days
